moves: 1. e4 c6 2. d4 d5 3. e5 Bf5 4. c3 e6 5. Be3 Qb6 6. Qb3 Nd7 7. Nd2 f6 8. f4 g5
comment:
a new development in this system.  Instead of  ..Nh6 (with or without ..h5)
and ..Ne7, the idea is to breakdown the pawn chain as quickly as possible. 
It's very similar to the plan of f6 and g5 in the French Defence Tarrasch.

moves: 1. e4 c6 2. d4 d5 3. e5 Bf5 4. c3 e6 5. Be3 Qb6 6. Qb3 Nd7 7. Nd2 f6 8. f4 g5 9. Ngf3 gxf4 10. Bxf4 Bh6 11. Bxh6 Nxh6 12. exf6 Nxf6 13. Be2 Rg8
comment: Black's equalised already; the half-point can be taken anytime now.
